## TokenNumber interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface TokenNumber extends Token<TokenType.Number, {
    value: number;
    type: NumberType;
    signCharacter?: '+' | '-';
}> 
```

'+' \| '-'

_(Optional)_ The sign character as it appeared in the source. This is only useful if you need to determine if a value was written as "2" or "+2".
